careers.name: careers
careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: Be part of our mission to create innovative digital products that shape the future of entertainment and social media.

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description: Join our development team to build cutting-edge user interfaces for our digital products using React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
items.label: Full-time • Remote

items.title: AI/ML Engineer
items.description: Work on machine learning algorithms and AI models that power our social media tools and content generation features.
items.label: Full-time • Hybrid

items.title: 3D Animation Artist
items.description: Create stunning 3D animations and visual effects for our entertainment projects, including the Mahavatar Narsimha film.
items.label: Contract • Remote

items.title: Product Manager
items.description: Lead product strategy and roadmap for our suite of digital entertainment and social media products.
items.label: Full-time • Onsite

items.title: DevOps Engineer
items.description: Build and maintain scalable infrastructure to support our growing user base and product portfolio.
items.label: Full-time • Remote

items.title: Content Strategist
items.description: Develop content strategies and marketing campaigns for our products across multiple digital channels.
items.label: Part-time • Remote
